name: PlayerTwo(Beta)
0:
”Alexa, open player two”
”Tristana's lore”
”How to play with Varus”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: player two
des:
The Skill Player Two makes accessing core information about the champions of Summoner's Rift easier. With this skill you can know your champions abilities, their names, their descriptions and even tips and tricks in case you play with the champion or encounter them in your games.
Player Two can give you valuable tips on how to play against a champion, just ask ;)

Another valuable resource is reading the description of items: Player Two can, in real time, offer a quick description of most of the game's items.

If you're a Runeterra lover, don't worry, we have content for you too. Player Two knows every champions lore up until current patch and this can be realy helpful for understanding more about Arcane's universe

*****
For any help, criticism or sugestions, make contact through the e-mail: cleytongomesx@gmail.com or through instagram @cleyton_gomesx 

*****
Updates in progress:
- Runes
- Recommended items
- Events

*****
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
